scripts.railway:build: echo '=== BUILD START ===' && echo 'Current directory: $(pwd)' && echo 'Directory contents:' && ls -la && echo '=== NPM INSTALL ===' && npm install && echo '=== PRISMA GENERATE ===' && npx prisma generate && echo '=== NEXT BUILD ===' && npm run build && echo '=== BUILD COMPLETE ===' && echo 'Final directory contents:' && ls -la
scripts.railway:start: echo '=== STARTING APP ===' && echo 'Current directory: $(pwd)' && echo 'Environment variables:' && env | grep -E '(PORT|NODE_ENV|RAILWAY|HOSTNAME)' && echo '=== STARTING NEXT.JS ===' && npm run start:all
